price: They hatched their plot[34], but their plot was known to Allah; even if their plot were such that would move mountains[35].
arabic: وَقَدۡ مَكَرُواْ مَكۡرَهُمۡ وَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ مَكۡرُهُمۡ وَإِن كَانَ مَكۡرُهُمۡ لِتَزُولَ مِنۡهُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ
footnotes:
[34] i.e., to kill the Prophet (ﷺ).
 [35] But due to its feebleness, their plotting was never to remove mountains.
